name: Spacelink
description:
Joe likes satellites, so he founded his very own private satellite launching company: Spacelink! Will Joe succeed with his shoddy equipment and public distrust, or will he amass a fortune?

  • Launch satellites into space
  • Lose money by the minute for unlaunched satellites because people are impatient!
  • Activate satellite thrusters to protect them from immanent collisions
  • Hit the aliens with satellites and they will come and steal one (and the public won't lose any trust!)
  • Hyper-realistic orbit simulation (definitely!)

Special thanks to Kyle and Dan for some graphics, game concept, and QA testing.

Technical aspects and credits for those interested:

  • Written in C with Vulkan and SDL2
  • All graphics save for the beautiful cannon done by me (Cannon was Kyle)
  • Original concept by Dan
  • QA testing by Kyle and Dan (forgot to disable debug layers lol)
  • Music and sound effects (all 3 of them) were my bass and pedals (what is sfxr)
